$:/plugins/nico/projectify/QuickCapture.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/QuickCapture
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/QuickCapture.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/

!! {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/quick-capture}} <<lingo QuickAddTodo>>

<$keyboard key="enter">
  <$action-createtiddler $basetitle={{$:/state/projectify/QuickCapture!!todo_name}} tags="Inbox todo"/>
  <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/state/projectify/QuickCapture" todo_name=""/>
  <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>
  <$edit-text
    class="py-input input-large"
    tiddler="$:/state/projectify/QuickCapture"
    field="todo_name"
    placeholder={{$:/language/projectify/AddToInbox/Placeholder}}
    focus="true"
  /> 
  <label class="py-label py-right-aligned"><<lingo QuickCapture/Hint>></label>
</$keyboard>

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/changelog.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/changelog
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/changelog.caption: ChangeLog
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/changelog.text:
! Master

!! Features

* New redesigned input for adding todos
* New configuration option for setting the first day of the week in date pickers
* New buttons for scheduling and setting a priority directly when adding a todo
* Do not render the form to add todos in archived projects

!! Improvements

* New filters in dashboard tab for todo priorities
* Documentation improvements WRT customizing Projectify

!! Fixes

* Prevent creation of todos with empty titles

! Release 0.13.1

!! Improvements

* New Spanish translation and empty edition
* New configuration option to show completed tasks by default
* Move down the "convert into project" button in the todo actions dropdown

!! Fixes

* Fix the link of the icon of todos with content not to toggle the state of the todos
* Fix the filter macro used in the filter dashboard tab
* Fix the position of the scheduled dropdown in the topbar
* Fix the rendering of todo captions in the scheduled dropdown

! Release 0.13.0

!! Features

* New Simplified Chinese translation plugin
* New German translation plugin
* New icon indicator in todo-lists for tasks that have content

!! Improvements

* Improve the rendering of the checkbox in the titlebar
* Render the checkbox button before the close button in the titlebar
* Improve the category selection dropdown
* When using the Relink plugin, automatically relink project categories
* Add links to category tiddlers in the control panel

! Release 0.12.0

!! Features

* Add a configuration option to hide welcome messages
* New filter tab in the dashboard
* New icons for projects and next actions

!! Improvements

* Improve the rendering of the QuickCapture tiddler
* Add a dragover style to project cards
* Improved the layout of the dashboard tabs on mobile
* New CSS transition on project card mouseover

!! Fixes

* Fix several translation issues
* If a project has no category, do not render it in the project card
* Fix the position of the count tag in the Today dashboard tab

! Release 0.11.0

!! Features

* Add support for categories in projects, with colours and filtering from the dashboard
* New button to convert todos into projects
* New category configuration tab in the Control Panel
* New French (fr-FR) language add-on plugin
* New Dutch (nl-NL) language add-on plugin

!! Improvements

* Render todo items using the new $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoCaption template
* Action buttons in Todo tiddlers are now rendered as regular buttons

! Release 0.10.0

!! Features

* New priority property on todos
* New configuration tab to the Control Panel
* New configuration setting for the default dashboard tab
* New configuration setting for switching between the list and card view of projects

!! Improvements

* New todo item layout
* Display due dates for yesterday/tomorrow as "Yesterday"/"Tomorrow"
* Add support for dragging todos in the welcome message of empty projects and inbox
* Add welcome screens to the Upcoming and Next Actions tabs of the dashboard
* Improved dashboard tabs on mobile to fit all tabs on one row

!! Fixes

* Fix an annoying bug where the calendar picker keyboard events stay active after the popup has been closed

! Release 0.9.0

!! Features

* New "Today" dashboard tab for todos due today
* New "Upcoming" dashboard tab for all scheduled todos

!! Improvements

* Only show scheduling button in todos that are not scheduled on hover
* Add a caption and description to ToggleTodo for the control panel
* Improve the rendering of sidebar sections by setting a max width
* Update icons and colors of the date-picker

!! Fixes

* Fix the selection of months and years in the date picker
* Fix the rendering of due dates in Notebook sidebar

! Release 0.8.0

!! Features

* New date picker popup for scheduling todo due dates
* Todos can now be moved between projects by dragging title links
* New search input in the Help tiddler
* Update the stylesheets to work with dark colour palettes

!! Improvements

* Display the link to the Help tiddler at the bottom of the Dashboard
* Remove the dependency to $:/plugins/kixam/datepicker
* Redesign Todo tiddler header buttons
* Trigger auto-save when modifying a project or todo
* Show today's date as "Today" in todo due dates

!! Fixes

* Fix the popup placement for creating new projects on mobile
* Filter out project drafts from project lists

! Release 0.7.1

!! Features

* New Help tab in the dashboard
* All tiddler links can now be dropped within todo lists to add the target tiddlers as todos
* New "Projects" and "Schedule" tabs added to the sidebar

!! Fixes

* Fix Scheduled button when there are overdue tasks
* Fix rendering glitch of project titles in project cards
* Fix rendering of scheduled todos in Notebook sidebar

! Release 0.7.0

!! Features

* New color setting on project cards

!! Improvements

* New icons from the OpenMoji project
* New welcome screens for the inbox and project list
* New project list in the sidebar when using the Notebook theme

!! Fixes

* Fix a typo in the Scheduled sidebar button
* Fix colors to work with dark palettes

! Release 0.6.1

!! Features

* When a project has both scheduled and unscheduled items, split the todo-list in 2 distinct sections
* Project cards now show the project description if set
* Item that have sub-tasks now show a pie chart in todo lists

!! Improvements

* Add a drag handle on scheduled todo items as well, so they can be dragged & moved between projects
* The button to add projects now toggles a form rendered within a popup
* The Schedule popup now shows overdue todos as well as today's todos
* Always render the todo-list so that todos can be dragged into empty projects

! Release 0.6.0

!! Features

* Todos can now moved between projects using drag & drop
* Todos can now be made into sub-projects by clicking the `Make this into a sub-project` button
* Empty projects and Inbox now show a welcome screen
* New checkbox button in the view toolbar of todo tiddlers
* New form to add new projects including an input for the project title
* The number of todos in a project is now represented with a small pie chart icon
* New card view of active projects in the dashboard
* Projects in the dashboard can now be reordered
* Projects without active todos are now omitted from the "Next" dashboard section
* New Schedule button in the page controls listings all todos scheduled today
* New list in the Schedule tab of the dashboard listing all item scheduled to be done after the next 30 days.

!! Improvements

* New icon set
* Improved style for checkboxes, buttons and inputs
* Improved style for the dashboard projects section
* Improved layout for completed todos in a project
* Added a drag handle for draggable todo items
* Scheduled todos are always sorted first

!! Fixes

* Fix creation of projects with triple double quotes
* Fix creation of todos with triple double quotes
* Fix drag&drop of todos with double quotes or triple double quotes

!! Breaking changes

* The `<<project>>` macro should not be used anymore. Instead, the plugin adds the <<tag SubProject>> tag to sub projects and renders their todo-list automatically.
* Projects are now archived using the <<tag done>> tag. The former `Archived` tag is not used anymore.

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Categorie.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Categories
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Categorie.text:
You can group similar [[Projects|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects]]
together by using Categories.

Categories can have colours, making it easy to visually distinguish projects by
category.

From within the [[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]], you can
filter projects by category, giving you a quick overview of all the active
projects for a given category.

Here are a few common categories you might want to use to get started:

* ''@work'' --- Groups all projects related to work.
* ''@home'' --- Groups all projects to work on when at home.
* ''@computer'' --- Groups all projects to work on when at the computer.

Categories can be customized in the dedicated
[[Control Panel section|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/config/Categories]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/CoreConce.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/CoreConcepts
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/CoreConce.caption: Core concepts
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/CoreConce.text:
The following tiddlers will help you learn the basics of Projectify.

* [[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]]
* [[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox]]
* [[Todos|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]]
* [[Projects|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects]]
* [[Categories|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Categories]]
* [[Refiling|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Refiling]]
* [[Schedule|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Schedule]]
* [[Customizing Projectify|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Customizing]]

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Customizi.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Customizing
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Customizi.text:
* [[Adding custom tabs to the bashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/DashboardCustomTabs]]
* [[Customizing how todos are rendered|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]]

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard.text:
The main entry point of Projectify is the dashboard.
It displays the [[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox]], lists
[[Projects|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects]], the
[[Schedule|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Schedule]] and [[Next actions|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/NextActions]].

<<py-tip "[[You do not have to use the dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/TranscludingUIElements]] to use Projectify.">>

The dashboard can be embedded
([[transcluded|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion]]) in any tiddler using the
following:

```
{{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashboard/Dashboard}}
```
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/projectify/usage-show-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="py-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/projectify/usage-show-dashboard" setTo="">Hide</$button>
  <hr/>
  {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashboard/Dashboard}}
  <hr/>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/projectify/usage-show-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="py-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/projectify/usage-show-dashboard" setTo="show">Show result</$button>
</$reveal>

The dashboard can be customized in many ways, for instance to [[display custom tabs|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/DashboardCustomTabs]] or [[display the Inbox in a separate tab|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/DashboardInboxSeparateTab]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/DashboardCustomTabs
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard.text:
Any tiddler with the tag <<tag $:/plugins/nico/projectify/tags/dashboard>> will
be displayed as a tab in the dashboard.

!! Listing high priority todos in the dashboard

The example below demonstrate how to add a tab to the
[[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]] to list all
[[Todos|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]] marked as high-priority. Save a
new tiddler with the content below, set its `caption` field to `High Priority`
and add the tag <<tag $:/plugins/nico/projectify/tags/dashboard>>.

```
!! High priority todos    

<$list
  filter="[tag[todo]!tag[done]priority[3]]"
  template="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoItem"
/>
```

You can also [[display the Inbox in a separate tab|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/DashboardInboxSeparateTab]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/DashboardInboxSeparateTab
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard.text:
You can build your own Dashboard to display the
[[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox]] as a separate tab using the
following:

```
<<tabs "$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/inbox/Inbox $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashboard/Projects $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashbaord/Today $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashbaord/Upcoming" "$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/inbox/Inbox" "$:/state/projectify/custom-dashboard" "py-tabs">>
```
<$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/projectify/usage-custom-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="py-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/projectify/usage-custom-dashboard" setTo="">Hide</$button>
  <hr/>
  <<tabs "$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/inbox/Inbox $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashboard/Projects $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashbaord/Today $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashbaord/Upcoming" "$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/inbox/Inbox" "$:/state/projectify/custom-dashboard" "py-tabs">>
  <hr/>
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/projectify/usage-custom-dashboard" text="show">
  <$button class="py-btn btn-primary" set="$:/state/projectify/usage-custom-dashboard" setTo="show">Show result</$button>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/GettingSt.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/GettingStarted
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/GettingSt.caption: Getting started
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/GettingSt.text:
Projectify is a [[TiddlyWiki|https://tiddlywiki.com]] plugin for managing
projects & todo lists, inspired by projects such as
[[Todoist|https://todoist.com]] and [[Basecamp|https://basecamp.com]]. It is
released under the [[MIT license|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/LICENSE]].

* See [[installation instructions|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Installation]] for help on installing Projectify in an existing wiki.

* To start using Projectify, [[transclude|https://tiddlywiki.com/#Transclusion]] the [[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]] into another tiddler.

* Configure Projectify from the ''Projectify'' tab of the  [[Control panel|$:/ControlPanel]].

* Read the documentation about the [[core concepts|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/CoreConcepts]] of Projectify.


For all changes in the latest {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify!!version}} release,
see [[ChangeLog|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/changelog]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Help.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Help
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Help.text:
{{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/welcome/HelpWelcome}} {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/forms/HelpSearch}}
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/plugins/nico/projectify/tags/help-card]!has[draft.of]]"> <$link overrideClass="py-card" to={{!!title}}>

{{!!caption}}

{{!!description}}

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox.text:
Citing [[David Allen|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Allen_(author)]]:

<<<
Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
<<< David Allen

The first step to get organized is to get everything out of your head.
The [[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/inbox/Inbox]] is a special
[[Project|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects]] where thoughts are captured
so you don't forget them, and can get them out of your head quickly.

[[Todos|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]] in the [[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/inbox/Inbox]]
can then be [[refiled|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Refiling]] into projects and/or [[scheduled|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Schedule]].

Projectify also provides a simple way to [[quickly capture|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/QuickCapture]] tasks into the Inbox.

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Installat.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Installation
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Installat.text:
!! Dependencies

While not strictly required, we strongly recommand installing the [[Relink|$:/plugins/flibbles/relink]] plugin as well, as it makes renaming projects much more convenient.

* [[$:/plugins/flibbles/relink]]

!! Plugin

Drag&drop the following link into your wiki

* [[$:/plugins/nico/projectify]]

Then save & reload your wiki.

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/NextActio.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/NextActions
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/NextActio.text:
The [[Next actions|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/NextActions]] tab of the
[[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]] lists the first open task
of each of your projects, with the project title.

The Next actions list gives a good high-level view of the next steps for each
project, making it easier to decide what to focus on next.

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects.text:
!! When to use projects

Projects structure [[Todos|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]] together into
separate todo lists. If you're working on something that requires more than one
task, create a project to structure your work.

!! How to create projects

You can create projects from the
[[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]], or by adding the
<<tag Project>> tag to an existing tiddler.

Clicking the {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/ProjectListSettings}}
button in the projects section of the
[[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]] let you change how
projects are displayed and reorder them.

!! Adding tasks to projects
  
The input at the bottom of a project tiddler lets you quickly add
[[Todos|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]] directly to that project.

!! Archiving projects
  
The {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/ArchiveProject}} button lets you
archive a project.

Archived projects are hidden by default from the main project list in the
[[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/QuickCapt.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/QuickCapture
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/QuickCapt.text:
You can press <kbd>{{$:/config/shortcuts/py-quick-capture}}</kbd> to
capture into the [[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox]] from anywhere.
You can change it in the [[Keyboard section of the Control Panel|$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/KeyboardShortcuts]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Refiling.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Refiling
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Refiling.text:
* To move a [[Todo|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]] from the [[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox]], just drag & drop the todo using the {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/drag-handle}} handle into one of the projects below the inbox.

* To move [[Todos|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]] between [[Projects|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects]], drag & drop the todo using the {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/drag-handle}} handle from one project into another.

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Schedule.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Schedule
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Schedule.text:
[[Todos|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos]] with a due date will appear in
the [[Upcoming|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashbaord/Upcoming]] or
[[Today|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashbaord/Today]] tab of the
[[Dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Todos.text:
Todos represent single units of work -- or tasks -- within [[Projects|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Projects]] or the [[Inbox|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Inbox]].

Any tiddler with the <<tag todo>> tag will be recognized as a todo.

Todos can be marked as done by checking their check box in the view toolbar. They can also be [[Scheduled|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Schedule]].

<<py-tip "To customize how todos are displayed, you can override the shadow tiddler [[$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoCaption]].">>

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Transclud.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/TranscludingUIElements
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Transclud.text:
Projectify can be used without using the [[dashboard|$:/plugins/nico/projectify/doc/Dashboard]].

The various UI elements provided by Projectify can be linked or transcluded in
any way that suits your workflow. For instance:

* Tiddlers can be used as projects by adding the <<tag Project>> tag. The todo-list will be displayed automatically.
* The Inbox can be displayed by transcluding [[$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/inbox/Inbox]].
* Upcoming tasks can be displayed by transcluding [[$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashbaord/Upcoming]].
* The full list of projects can be displayed by transcluding [[$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/dashboard/Projects]].

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/pie.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/pie
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/pie.text:
<$set name="PI" value="3.14">
  <$set name="circumference" value={{{ [<PI>multiply[2]multiply[5]] }}}>
    <$set name="all" value={{{ [tag<currentTiddler>!has[draft.of]count[]] }}}>
      <$set name="closed" value={{{ [tag<currentTiddler>!has[draft.of]tag[done]count[]]}}}>
	<$set name="ratio" value={{{ [<all>is[0]then<circumference>else<circumference>multiply<closed>divide<all>] }}}>
        <svg
          class="py-icon py-pie"
          height="1em"
          width="1em"
          viewBox="0 0 30 30">

          <circle
            class="border"
            r="14"
            cx="15"
            cy="15"
            fill="white"
            stroke="tomato"
            stroke-width="2"/>

          <circle
            class="border"
            r="5"
            cx="15"
            cy="15"
            fill="transparent"
            stroke="tomato"
            stroke-width="10"
            transform="rotate(-90) translate(-30)"
            stroke-dasharray={{{ [<ratio>addsuffix[ 31.42]] }}}/>

        </svg>
      </$set>
    </$set>
  </$set>
</$set>

You can also press {{$:/config/shortcuts/py-quick-capture}} to capture from anywhere.

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/filter.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/filters
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/filter.text:
\whitespace trim

\define py-archived-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!has[draft.of]!title[Inbox]tag[done]sort[title]]
\end

\define py-active-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!has[draft.of]!title[Inbox]!tag[done]]
\end

\define py-all-categories()
[all[tiddlers]tag[$:/plugins/nico/projectify/tags/Category]sort[title]]
\end

\define py-has-scheduled-todos-in-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[todo]!tag[done]!has[draft.of]has[due]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-active-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-archived-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!title[Inbox]tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-projects()
[all[tiddlers]tag[Project]!title[Inbox]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-is-project()
[all[tiddlers]all[current]tag[Project]] [all[current]tag[SubProject]]
\end

\define py-is-not-subproject()
[all[tiddlers]all[current]!tag[SubProject]]
\end

\define py-is-empty-project()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-category()
[all[current]has[category]]
\end

\define py-has-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-open-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-no-open-todo()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]count[]match[0]]
\end

\define py-has-scheduled-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]has[due]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-unscheduled-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]!has[due]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-completed-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-next-open-todo()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-filtered-todos()
[all[tiddlers]subfilter<todoFilter>tag[todo]sort[title]]
\end

\define py-open-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]]
\end

\define py-completed-todos()
[all[tiddlers]tag{!!title}tag[done]!has[draft.of]sort[created]]
\end

\define py-todos-due-today()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]days:due[0]!nsort[priority]]
\end

\define py-todos-overdue()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!days:due[-1]sort[due]]
\end

\define py-todos-due-today-or-overdue()
[all[tiddlers]days:due[0]] [all[tiddlers]!days:due[-1]] +[!has[draft.of]!tag[done]tag[todo]sort[due]]
\end

\define py-upcoming-due-dates()
[all[tiddlers]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]has[due]sort[due]eachday[due]] -[!days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-todos-due-on()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]sameday:due<day>!nsort[priority]]
\end

\define py-has-overdue-todos()
[all[tiddlers]!tag[done]tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!days:due[-1]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-has-todos-due-today-or-overdue()
[all[tiddlers]days:due[0]] [all[tiddlers]!days:due[-1]] +[!has[draft.of]!tag[done]tag[todo]limit[1]]
\end

\define py-is-todo()
[all[current]tag[todo]]
\end

\define py-is-open()
[all[current]!tag[done]]
\end

\define py-is-completed()
[all[current]tag[done]]
\end

\define py-is-overdue()
[all[current]!tag[done]!has[draft.of]!days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-is-due-today()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]days:due[0]]
\end

\define py-is-due-yesterday()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-is-due-tomorrow()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]days:due[1]]
\end

\define py-is-due-later()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]!days:due[1]]
\end

\define py-is-scheduled()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]has[due]]
\end

\define py-is-not-scheduled()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]!has[due]]
\end

\define py-is-not-overdue()
[all[current]!has[draft.of]] -[!days:due[-1]]
\end

\define py-unscheduled-todos-subfilter()
tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]!has[due]!nsort[priority]
\end

\define py-scheduled-todos-subfilter()
tag[todo]!has[draft.of]!tag[done]has[due]sort[due]
\end

\define py-is-active-subfilter()
!tag[done]
\end

\define py-all-projects-and-subprojects-filter()
[tag[Project]] [tag[SubProject]]
\end

\define todo-list-drop-tags()
todo [all[current]tags[]] -Inbox -[tag[Project]] -[tag[SubProject]] [<__tag__>]
\end

\define project-refile-tags()
todo [all[<actionTiddler>]tags[]] -Inbox -[tag[Project]] -[tag[SubProject]] [<currentTiddler>]
\end

\define py-convert-todo-into-project()
[all[current]tags[]] -Inbox -[tag[Project]] -[tag[SubProject]] -SubProject -Inbox -todo Project
\end

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/schedu.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/schedule
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/schedu.text:
\whitespace trim

\define py-schedule-overdue()
  <$list
    filter=<<py-todos-overdue>>
    template="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoItem"
  />
\end

\define py-schedule-day(day)
  <$vars day=<<__day__>>>
    <$list
      filter=<<py-todos-due-on>>
      template="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoItem"
      />
  </$vars>
\end

\define py-schedule-today()
  <$list
    filter=<<py-todos-due-today>>
    template="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoItem"
    emptyMessage=" {{$:/language/projectify/AllClear}}"
  />
\end

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/todo-l.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/todo-list
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/macros/todo-l.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/ \define project-refile-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags=<>/> \end \define todo-list-drop-actions(tag) <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $tags=<>/> <$set name="order" filter="[<__tag__>tagging[]]"> <$list filter="[<__tag__>tagging[]]"> <$action-deletefield $field="list-before"/> <$action-deletefield $field="list-after"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<<__tag__>> $field="list" $filter="+[enlist] +[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> \end \define todo-list-filtered(subFilter) <$vars projectTag={{!!title}} dragHandle="yes" list-tagged-draggable-drop-actions=<> >
<$macrocall $name="list-tagged-draggable" tag=<> subFilter=<<__subFilter__>> itemTemplate="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoItem" />
\end \define todo-list(emptyTemplate) <$list filter=<> variable="ignore"> <$transclude tiddler=<<__emptyTemplate__>>/> <$list filter=<> variable="ignore"> <$macrocall $name="todo-list-filtered" subFilter=<>/> <$list filter=<> variable="ignore"> <$list filter=<>> <$macrocall $name="todo-list-filtered" subFilter=<>/> \end \define todo-list-completed()
<$list filter=<> template="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/todo/TodoItem" />
\end

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/Ca.title: $:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/CategoryFilter
$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/Ca.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/

<$vars
  popupTiddler=<<qualify "$:/state/projectify/category-filter-dropdown">>
  stateTiddler="$:/state/projectify/project-category-filter"
>
  <$button popup=<<popupTiddler>> class="py-btn btn-small">
    {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/funnel}}
    <$reveal type="match" state=<<stateTiddler>> text="">
      <<lingo FilterProjects>>
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTiddler>> text="">
      Projects in
      <$tiddler tiddler={{{ [<stateTiddler>get[text]] }}}>
	{{||$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/category/Category}}
      </$tiddler>
    </$reveal>
  </$button>

  <$reveal state=<<popupTiddler>> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down py-drop-down">
    <$list filter=<<py-all-categories>> variable="category">
      <$vars colour={{{ [<category>get[color]] }}}>
	<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
	  <$tiddler tiddler=<<category>>>
	    {{||$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/category/Category}}
	  </$tiddler>
	  <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<stateTiddler>> text=<<category>>/>
	</$button>
      </$vars>
    </$list>

    <hr/>
    <$link to="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/config/Categories">
      <<lingo EditCategories>>
    </$link>
  </$reveal>

  <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<stateTiddler>> text="">
    <$button class="tc-btn-invisible btn-small py-link-muted">
      <<lingo Clear>>
	<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<stateTiddler>>/>
    </$button>
  </$reveal>

</$vars>

$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/buttons/Se.text:
\define lingo-base() $:/language/projectify/

<$vars popupTiddler=<<qualify "$:/state/projectify/category-dropdown">>>
  <$button
    popup=<<popupTiddler>>
    class="py-btn btn-small"
    tooltip={{$:/language/projectify/SetCategory/Hint}}
  >
    <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!category" text="">
      <$tiddler tiddler={{!!category}}>
	{{||$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/category/Category}}
      </$tiddler>
    </$reveal>
    <$reveal type="match" state="!!category" text="">
      <<lingo SetCategory/Caption>>
    </$reveal>
  </$button>

  <$reveal state=<<popupTiddler>> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" class="tc-drop-down py-drop-down">
    <$list filter=<<py-all-categories>> variable="category">
      <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
	<$tiddler tiddler=<<category>>>
	  {{||$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/category/Category}}
	</$tiddler>
	<$action-setfield category=<<category>>/>
      </$button>
    </$list>
    <$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
      {{$:/plugins/nico/projectify/images/slash-circle}} <<lingo Clear>>
      <$action-deletefield $field="category"/>
    </$button>
    <hr/>
    <$link to="$:/plugins/nico/projectify/ui/config/Categories">
      <<lingo EditCategories>>
    </$link>
  </$reveal>
</$vars>
